title: An admonition: to all such as shall intend hereafter to enter the state of matrimonie godly, and agreeable to lawes. ... Set foorth by the most reuerend Father in God, Mathew Archbishop of Canterburie, ...
author: Parker, Matthew, 1504-1575.
notes: Text in English; catalogue has Latin and English in parallel columns.
Torn and stained, slightly affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
